title: The Long-Overdue Revolution in Economic Thinking
itunes:title: The Long-Overdue Revolution in Economic Thinking
description: University of Texas economist James K. Galbraith engages in a wide-ranging discussion of the many ways in which conventional economics has failed us, ranging from how to manage the post-pandemic economy, the role of finance, to the problems of inequality and climate change.
